decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (AA8042-P01, AA8042-P03, AA8042-P02, AA8042-P03. Received 12/12/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling on this site and shall not be occupied as primary residential accommodation or as a separate dwelling or for business use.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to main house and an outbuilding at the rear of the garden for use as office, gym and garden store.
